definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: The "witchcraft" line referred to Franklin's imminent departure.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的“巫術”散去暗指富蘭克林即將離開。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese philosophers were born out of sorcery.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代哲學家們起初多信奉巫術。

sentences.english: Sorceries and instants differ only in when they can be cast.
sentences.chinese: 巫術和瞬間的差異僅在使用的時機。

sentences.english: Many women accused of practicing witchcraft were tortured or even burned to death.
sentences.chinese: 許多女人被控行巫術，遭受拷打後被施以火刑。

sentences.english: Lorekeep, the great city of necromantic magic, lies in ruins .
sentences.chinese: 學識要塞，偉大的巫術魔法之城，現在已是一片廢墟。

sentences.english: A berserker wizard gets no score for treasure.
sentences.chinese: 一個狂暴的巫術師得不到珍貴的記號。

sentences.english: Ganqi performance in Xingtian myth contained witchery and religious factors.
sentences.chinese: 積澱在刑天神話中的干鏚之舞，蘊含巫術宗教因素。

sentences.english: Only one target can be hexed at a time. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
sentences.chinese: 只有一個目標在同一時間能被巫術。

sentences.english: Alleged sorcery by fox demons occasionally caused collective panics.
sentences.chinese: 宣揚狐妖巫術偶爾會引發羣體的恐慌。

sentences.english: Soon the Orc shamans began to talk of sorcery and that the storm was unnatural.
sentences.chinese: 薩滿法師們宣稱這非自然的風暴中充滿了巫術的氣息。

sentences.english: So Milarepa's mother sent him away to learn black magic for revenge.
sentences.chinese: 於是老母送密勒日巴去學巫術黑法，要報仇。

sentences.english: These archetypes of the divine are worshipped by Wiccans to this very day.
sentences.chinese: 巫術崇拜者每天崇拜這些神的原型。

sentences.english: Only one target can be hexed at a time.
sentences.chinese: 一次只能對一個單位釋放巫術。

sentences.english: The law has also been criticized by a number of people in the non-magical community.
sentences.chinese: 這項新法也遭受一些非巫術界人士的抨擊。

sentences.english: She was quickly suspected of practicing witchcraft and sent back to prison.
sentences.chinese: 很快又有人懷疑她使用巫術，他們把她遣回監獄。

sentences.english: Crick likens her departure to "the smoke of witchcraft" clearing from the group's eyes.
sentences.chinese: 克里克將她的離去比作消除團隊眼前的“巫術煙幕”。

definition: god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
